name: loouislow
description: My personal and portfolio website built with krugurt.js MVP framework

scripts.build: npm run min-image && npm run min-scripts && npm run min-sass && npm run min-html && npm run min-data && npm run locale && npm run service-worker && npm run app-manifest
scripts.min-scripts: npm run gulp pre-scripts && npm run gulp scripts
scripts.min-image: npm run gulp image-high-quality && npm run gulp image-low-quality && npm run gulp webp-high-quality && npm run gulp webp-low-quality

author: Loouis Low <loouis@gmail.com>
